commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas627bc98"

diff:
"627bc98 Bug 301972 - "Save to Disk" option needs to be more clear.  Patch by Kurt (supernova_00) <supernova_00@yahoo.com>.  r=sdwilsh, ui-r=beltzner, a=mconnor
diff --git a/toolkit/locales/en-US/chrome/mozapps/downloads/unknownContentType.dtd b/toolkit/locales/en-US/chrome/mozapps/downloads/unknownContentType.dtd
index 65265a0..7e3a152 100755
--- a/toolkit/locales/en-US/chrome/mozapps/downloads/unknownContentType.dtd
+++ b/toolkit/locales/en-US/chrome/mozapps/downloads/unknownContentType.dtd
@@ -45,8 +45,8 @@
 <!ENTITY  openWith.accesskey          "o">
 <!ENTITY  other.label                 "Other...">
 
-<!ENTITY  save.label                  "Save to Disk">
-<!ENTITY  save.accesskey              "s">
+<!ENTITY  saveFile.label              "Save File">
+<!ENTITY  saveFile.accesskey          "s">
 
 <!ENTITY  rememberChoice.label        "Do this automatically for files like this from now on.">
 <!ENTITY  rememberChoice.accesskey    "a">
diff --git a/toolkit/mozapps/downloads/content/unknownContentType.xul b/toolkit/mozapps/downloads/content/unknownContentType.xul
index 164f621..895297b 100755
--- a/toolkit/mozapps/downloads/content/unknownContentType.xul
+++ b/toolkit/mozapps/downloads/content/unknownContentType.xul
@@ -106,7 +106,7 @@
           </deck>
         </hbox>
         
-        <radio id="save" label="&save.label;" accesskey="&save.accesskey;"/>
+        <radio id="save" label="&saveFile.label;" accesskey="&saveFile.accesskey;"/>
       </radiogroup> 
       <separator class="thin"/>
       <hbox class="small-indent">
"
